title: Font ID Please
content:
Anyone recognize this font??

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RnD%20Deli_3756.jpg)

Thanks in advance,  
Nicole
author: Nicole325

comments.content:
In a style of Art Nouveau, groovy, and organic this bulbous dieter's special looks familiar but I can't recall a specific font for an exact match.  
Here some passable substitutes:  
Toulouse Lautrec Theatre Antoine

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ToulouseLautrecTheatreAntoineAsRND_3794.gif)
  [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/toulouse-lautrec-theatre-antoine/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/toulouse-lautrec-theatre-antoine/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/toulouse-lautrec-theatre-antoine/")  
Doobie -- top half is pretty close but bottom half could use some deflating 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DoobieAsRND_6367.gif)
  [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/doobie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/doobie/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/doobie/")  
Kush 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KushAsRND_4931.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ourhousegraphics/kush/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ourhousegraphics/kush/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ourhousegraphics/kush/")  
Jimi 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JimiAsRND_5379.gif)
  [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jimi/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jimi/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/jimi/")  
Don

Not as close, but with some resemblance in tone:  
Herold [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/herold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/herold/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/herold/")  
Fraggle [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/fraggle/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/fraggle/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/fraggle/")  
Roberta [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/roberta/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/roberta/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/roberta/")  
Display Art Three [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/display-art-three/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/display-art-three/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/display-art-three/")  
Display Art One [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/display-art-one/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114335/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/display-art-one/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/display-art-one/")  
Don
